title: Best friends
creator_credit: Bob Browning, Robert Verrall, Wolf Koenig and National Film Board of Canada
brief_description: An animated film portraying the effects of cigarette smoke on the heart and lungs. What the noxious fumes of tobacco do to the defenceless lung tissue shouldn’t happen to an enemy, let alone a friend, as the film convincingly illustrates. For young viewers at an age where they might be enticed to take up smoking.
